column4: Hi, I've got a script that runs and occasionally outputs a string to stdout (Python script). I want to put that script in the background and disown it from the terminal I ran it from, and redirect the output to a file. I'm trying with this command but it's not working, can anyone tell me why? pythonscript.py & disown > "`date`".log
I just get a zero-length file.
possibly put & disown at the end
